content: shows the chains and numbers of chains according to sizes photo 4 turn your work make a half_double_crochet into 3rd chain from your hook make half_double_crochet into each chain and continue making half_double_crochet into each treble_crochet of your previous round until you reach the chain s make half_double_crochet into each of the chain this is the first round of your sleeves and bust part see the photo5 what your first row of the sleeves will look like half_double_crochet made all thoroughout photo 5 from now on we continue working in row only on half of the top ignore the other half for now we will come back to it later row 1 of the sleeves & bust part rs if you are making a stripy top change the colour now try not to make too big knots when changing colours as they could be seen on the edge of the sleeves make 4ch make treble_crochet into each half_double_crochet turn row 2 of the sleeves & bust part make 2ch make half_double_crochet into each treble_crochet turn repeat row 1&2 of the sleeves and bust part 4/4/5/6 more times bind off cut off yarn now turn your work and go back to your added chain s you will be working on the second half of the round if you are making a stripy top use the same color of yarn as you made your extra chain s make a slip_stitch into the last chain on your right side make 2ch and make a half_double_crochet into the 3rd chain from your hook it may feel awkward as you have already made half_double_crochet into those chain s while you worked on your front part but work on the other side of the chain s make half_double_crochet into all chain s make half_double_crochet into all treble_crochet until you reach the chain s continue making half_double_crochet into all the chain s see the photo 6 below the arrow shows a first treble_crochet already made of the following row the black dashed line shows the half_double_crochet already made and the red dashed line shows where the chain you are working into are hiding photo 6 turn row 1 of the sleeves & bust part rs if you are making a stripy top change the color now try not to make too big knots when changing colors as they could be seen on the edge of the sleeves make 4ch make treble_crochet into each half_double_crochet turn row 2 of the sleeves & bust part make 2ch make half_double_crochet into each treble_crochet turn repeat row 1&2 of the sleeves & bust part 4/4/5/6 more times bind off cut off yarn seaming the front and back sleeves & bust together since we worked in round for the first half of our work we have a little bit of seaming together the shoulders lay the top flat with the upper parts neatly on the top of of each other using the yarn needle seam the parts together i like to use
